page.title: 06Schools in Frome
page.content: {Nursery Schools:}There are 3. {Playgroups:}There are 9 in Frome. {First Schools:}Children 4 to 9 years. 1. Christchurch VC. Roll 1985 153 2. Hayesdown 257 3. Trinity VC 246 4. St.Johns VA 264 5. St.Louis VA RC 121 6. Vallis 289 {Middle Schools:}Children 9 to 13 yrs. 1.Selwood vc. 799 2.Oakfield 803 These take children from Frome & surrounding villages. {Frome College:}It has 20 departments, 85 staff & 1550 pupils (over 13) Uses sports centre & theatre on site. The College is responsible for further education in another site. It provides courses in languages,pottery,weaving, business studies, navigation, astronomy etc. Stephanie & Sarah. 10
